summary: AN ORDINANCE adopting a plan of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal water system of The City of Seattle; declaring the estimated cost thereof; authorizing the public sale and issuance of $8,100,000 par value of water revenue bonds of the City to provide the moneys therefor; providing that said bonds be issued on a parity with the outstanding water revenue bonds issued under Ordinance 87150, 88730, 90505, 91792, 96818, 100863, 106757, and 108246 and line bonds hereafter authorized.
